quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: The stupid neither forgive nor forget; the naive forgive and forget; the wise forgive but do not forget.
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
author: Lewis B. Smedes

quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Children begin by loving their parents; after a time they judge them; rarely, if ever, do they forgive them.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: To err is human; to forgive, divine.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Forgiveness is not always easy. At times, it feels more painful than the wound we suffered, to forgive the one that inflicted it. And yet, there is no peace without forgiveness.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: It's not an easy journey, to get to a place where you forgive people. But it is such a powerful place, because it frees you.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: When I was a kid I used to pray every night for a new bicycle. Then I realised that the Lord doesn't work that way so I stole one and asked Him to forgive me.
author: Emo Philips

quote: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: For me, forgiveness and compassion are always linked: how do we hold people accountable for wrongdoing and yet at the same time remain in touch with their humanity enough to believe in their capacity to be transformed?
author: bell hooks

quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: We think that forgiveness is weakness, but it's absolutely not; it takes a very strong person to forgive.
author: T. D. Jakes

quote: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: There is no revenge so complete as forgiveness.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Acceptance and tolerance and forgiveness, those are life-altering lessons.
author: Jessica Lange

quote: Forgive many things in others; nothing in yourself.
author: Ausonius

quote: It's one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Forgive, O Lord, my little jokes on Thee, and I'll forgive Thy great big joke on me.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Forgiveness is the economy of the heart... forgiveness saves the expense of anger, the cost of hatred, the waste of spirits.
author: Hannah More

quote: Many times, the decisions we make affect and hurt your closest friends and family the most. I have a lot of regrets in that regard. But God has forgiven me, which I am very thankful for. It has enabled me to forgive myself and move forward one day at a time.
author: Lex Luger

quote: Nothing inspires forgiveness quite like revenge.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Sweet mercy is nobility's true badge.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself.
author: Suzanne Somers

quote: He that cannot forgive others breaks the bridge over which he must pass himself; for every man has need to be forgiven.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Forgiveness is not a feeling - it's a decision we make because we want to do what's right before God. It's a quality decision that won't be easy and it may take time to get through the process, depending on the severity of the offense.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Anger begets more anger, and forgiveness and love lead to more forgiveness and love.
author: Mahavira

quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
author: William Blake

quote: It is often easier to ask for forgiveness than to ask for permission.
author: Grace Hopper

quote: God may forgive your sins, but your nervous system won't.
author: Alfred Korzybski

quote: The lesson is that you can still make mistakes and be forgiven.
author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: When a deep injury is done us, we never recover until we forgive.
author: Alan Paton

quote: Forgiveness is God's command.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
author: Les Brown

quote: I learned a long time ago that some people would rather die than forgive. It's a strange truth, but forgiveness is a painful and difficult process. It's not something that happens overnight. It's an evolution of the heart.
author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: We win by tenderness. We conquer by forgiveness.
author: Frederick William Robertson

quote: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
author: Joan Lunden

quote: It is in pardoning that we are pardoned.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Selfishness must always be forgiven you know, because there is no hope of a cure.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Beware of the man who does not return your blow: he neither forgives you nor allows you to forgive yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: As we know, forgiveness of oneself is the hardest of all the forgivenesses.
author: Joan Baez

quote: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: Man has two great spiritual needs. One is for forgiveness. The other is for goodness.
author: Billy Graham

quote: I can forgive, but I cannot forget, is only another way of saying, I will not forgive. Forgiveness ought to be like a cancelled note - torn in two, and burned up, so that it never can be shown against one.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: Forgiveness is an act of the will, and the will can function regardless of the temperature of the heart.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: Forgiveness is the remission of sins. For it is by this that what has been lost, and was found, is saved from being lost again.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: All major religious traditions carry basically the same message, that is love, compassion and forgiveness the important thing is they should be part of our daily lives.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: He that cannot forgive others, breaks the bridge over which he himself must pass if he would ever reach heaven; for everyone has need to be forgiven.
author: George Herbert

quote: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Only the brave know how to forgive... a coward never forgave; it is not in his nature.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: Forgive, forget. Bear with the faults of others as you would have them bear with yours.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Forgiveness is the answer to the child's dream of a miracle by which what is broken is made whole again, what is soiled is made clean again.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Forgiveness is the needle that knows how to mend.
author: Jewel
